channel.title: CVE Feed for drEryk sp. z o.o. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for drEryk sp. z o.o. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3699|2024-07-30T14:29:17.807Z -- dreryk%20sp.%20z%20o.o. -- dreryk%20gabinet
item.description: Use of hard-coded password to the patients' database allows an attacker to retrieve sensitive data stored in the database. The password is the same among all drEryk Gabinet installations.This issue affects drEryk Gabinet software versions from 7.0.0.0 through 9.17.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-3699|2024-06-10T11:18:16.709Z -- dreryk%20sp.%20z%20o.o. -- dreryk%20gabinet
item.description: Use of hard-coded password to the patients' database allows an attacker to retrieve sensitive data stored in the database. The password is the same among all drEryk Gabinet installations.This issue affects drEryk Gabinet software versions from 7.0.0.0 through 9.17.0.0.
